Jose.src.util

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jose.src.util.View

  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    The view class represent's a camera following the player, allows camera movement and restriction for update of characters, since only those in the view need to be updated.
    Author:
    Dzejrou

    • Constructor Detail

      • View

        public View(org.newdawn.slick.tiled.TiledMap map,
            float x,
            float y,
            float width,
            float height)
        View class constructor, sets all atributes and calculates the map size.
        Parameters:
        map - Reference to the level's tile map.
        x - X axis coordinate of the view.
        y - Y axis coordinate of the view.
        width - Width of the view.
        height - Height of the view.

    • Method Detail

      • move_horizontally

        public void move_horizontally(float pos_x)
        Moves the view horizontally to a given coordinate. Checks the bounds, this might result in a part of the map on the right end not being visible - maps have to align to a multiple of the view's width!
        Parameters:
        pos_x - X axis coordinate.

      • move_vertically

        public void move_vertically(int mod)
        Moves the view vertically up or down by it's height.
        Parameters:
        mod - Direction modifier.

      • move

        public void move(float pos_x,
                 float pos_y)
        Moves the view to a given coordinate. At the moment the vertical movement has been changed to jump by the view's height - move one window up, but the pos_y argument has been left here for the possibility of a vertically oriented level - like a climbing one - where the camera follows the player up and down, instead of left and right.
        Parameters:
        pos_x - X axis coordinate.
        pos_y - Y axis coordinate - NOT USED.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape other)
        Checks if a given hitbox is inside the view and therefore should be updated and/or rendered.
        Parameters:
        other - Hitbox to be checked (rectangle).
        Returns:
        True if the given hitbos is inside the view, false otherwise.
